section.title: Running on a web server in future DITA Open Toolkit releases
section.p: All the application code required for building XHTML output from DITA source is written in the Java programming language. Starting with release 1.3, DITA Open Toolkit will support incremental builds, which means a build will only need to process changed files to produce output. Some DITA users are already talking about running the DITA build on a web server so they can dynamically create web pages from DITA source files.
